com.perfectplay.org

Class JLOL

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.perfectplay.org.JLOL

  • public class JLOL
extends java.lang.Object
    Primary interface used to query the League of Legends servers. LRU caching is used to efficiently cache queried data.
    Version:
    1.0 12/16/13
    Author:
    Hector Medina-Fetterman

    • Method Detail

      • getChampion

        public static Champion getChampion(java.lang.String name)
                            throws InvalidQueryException
        This method returns the champion with the given name. If the champion doesn't exist, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the champion for querying
        Returns:
        the champion being queried
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason.

      • getChampions

        public static Champion[] getChampions()
                               throws InvalidQueryException
        This method queries the League of Legends servers for all currently available champions.
        Returns:
        an array of all current champions
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason

      • getFreeChampions

        public static Champion[] getFreeChampions()
                                   throws InvalidQueryException
        This method returns an array of all free champions. If all champions have already been cached, this will simply filter out the free ones to minimize API calls.
        Returns:
        an array of all free champions
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason

      • getSummoner

        public static Summoner getSummoner(java.lang.String name)
                            throws InvalidQueryException
        This method returns the summoner with the given name. An invalid summoner name will throw an InvalidQueryException with the BAD_REQUEST error.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the summoner for querying
        Returns:
        the summoner being queried
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason.

      • getSummoner

        public static Summoner getSummoner(long id)
                            throws InvalidQueryException
        This method returns the summoner with the given id. An invalid summoner id will throw an InvalidQueryException with the BAD_REQUEST error.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the summoner being queried
        Returns:
        the summoner being queried
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason.

      • getSummonerMasteries

        public static MasteryPage[] getSummonerMasteries(long id)
                                          throws InvalidQueryException
        This method returns the mastery pages of a summoner given their id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of a summoner for querying
        Returns:
        the mastery pages of the summoner
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason.

      • getSummonerRunes

        public static RunePage[] getSummonerRunes(long id)
                                   throws InvalidQueryException
        This method returns the rune pages of a summoner given their id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of a summoner for querying
        Returns:
        the rune pages of the summoner
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason.

      • getSummonerMasteries

        public static MasteryPage[] getSummonerMasteries(java.lang.String name)
                                          throws InvalidQueryException
        This method returns the mastery pages of a summoner given their name. Note that this query requires two calls to the League servers unless the summoner has been previously queried and is stored in cache.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the summoner to query
        Returns:
        the mastery pages of the summoner
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason.

      • getSummonerRunes

        public static RunePage[] getSummonerRunes(java.lang.String name)
                                   throws InvalidQueryException
        This method returns the rune pages of a summoner given their name. Note that this query requires two calls to the League servers unless the summoner has been previously queried and is stored in cache.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the summoner to query
        Returns:
        the rune pages of the summoner
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason.

      • getRecentGames

        public static Game[] getRecentGames(java.lang.String name)
                             throws InvalidQueryException
        This method returns up to 10 games that the summoner has recently played. Note that this query requires two calls to the League servers unless the summoner has been previously queried and is stored in cache.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the summoner to query
        Returns:
        games the summoner has recently played
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason.

      • getRecentGames

        public static Game[] getRecentGames(long id)
                             throws InvalidQueryException
        This method returns up to 10 games that the summoner has recently played.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the summoner to query
        Returns:
        games the summoner has recently played
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason.

      • getLeagues

        public static League[] getLeagues(long id)
                           throws InvalidQueryException
        This method returns the leagues a summoner is in given their unique Id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the summoner to query
        Returns:
        leagues the summoner is in
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason.

        This method returns the leagues a summoner is in given their name.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        leagues the summoner is in
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason.

      • getSummaryStatistics

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,SummaryStatistic> getSummaryStatistics(long id,
                                                                    java.lang.String season)
                                                                             throws InvalidQueryException
        This method returns a map of statistic types to statistics for the given type. Altering the Map will alter the cached data. Use the season constants to choose a valid season.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the summoner to query
        season - the season to query for
        Returns:
        a map of statistic types to statistics
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason.

      • getSummaryStatistics

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,SummaryStatistic> getSummaryStatistics(java.lang.String name,
                                                                    java.lang.String season)
                                                                             throws InvalidQueryException
        This method returns a map of statistic types to statistics for the given type. Altering the Map will alter the cached data. Use the season constants to choose a valid season.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the summoner to query
        season - the season to query for
        Returns:
        a map of statistic types to statistics
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason.

      • getSummaryStatistics

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,SummaryStatistic> getSummaryStatistics(long id)
                                                                             throws InvalidQueryException
        This method returns a map of statistic types to statistics for the given type. Altering the Map will alter the cached data. The values returned are for the current season.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the summoner to query
        Returns:
        a map of statistic types to statistics
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason.

      • getSummaryStatistics

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,SummaryStatistic> getSummaryStatistics(java.lang.String name)
                                                                             throws InvalidQueryException
        This method returns a map of statistic types to statistics for the given type. Altering the Map will alter the cached data. The values returned are for the current season.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the summoner to query
        Returns:
        a map of statistic types to statistics
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if the query does not complete for any reason.

      • setCacheSize

        public static void setCacheSize(int count)
        Resizes the cache for each query type. This will clear all cached items. The count should be greater than or equal to 0.
        Parameters:
        count - the cache size

      • setCacheTimeout

        public static void setCacheTimeout(float hours)
        Sets the timeout for cached items. Items which have been previously cached will still follow this timeout. A timeout of 0 will cache items, but not take advantage of the cache, as the items will immediately timeout.
        Parameters:
        hours - timeout in hours

      • getQueryCount

        public static int getQueryCount()
        Returns the total number of queries made to the League of Legends servers.

      • clearCache

        public static void clearCache()
        Clears all cached data.
